American Psycho.Author: Bret Easton Ellis
American Psycho.Details: American Psycho is a black comedy horror novel by American writer Bret Easton Ellis, published in 1991. The story is told in the first-person by Patrick Bateman, a wealthy, narcissistic, and vain Manhattan investment banker who lives a double life as a serial killer

House Of Leaves.Author: Mark Z. Danielewski
House Of Leaves.Details: House of Leaves is the debut novel by American author Mark Z. Danielewski, published in March 2000 by Pantheon Books. A bestseller, it has been translated into a number of languages, and is followed by a companion piece, The Whalestoe Letters

The Picture Of Dorian Gray.Author: Oscar Wilde
The Picture Of Dorian Gray.Details: The Picture of Dorian Gray is an 1890 philosophical fiction and gothic horror novel by Irish writer Oscar Wilde. A shorter novella-length version was published in the July 1890 issue of the American periodical Lippincott's Monthly Magazine, while the novel-length version was published in April 1891

A Little Life.Author: Hanya Yanagihara
A Little Life.Details: A Little Life is a 2015 novel by American writer Hanya Yanagihara. Lengthy and tackling difficult subject matter, it garnered critical acclaim, was shortlisted for the 2015 Man Booker Prize and the National Book Awards, and became a best selle

The Love Hypothesis.Author: Ali Hazelwood
The Love Hypothesis.Details: The Love Hypothesis is a romance novel by Ali Hazelwood, published September 14, 2021 by Berkley Books.

Chocolate Muffins.Allergens: Gluten (from wheat flour), eggs, and milk
Chocolate Muffins.Details: Rich and delicious Chocolate Muffins made with an intense chocolate batter and studded with chocolate chips throughout

Scones.Allergens: gluten (from wheat flour), dairy (milk and butter), and egg
Scones.Details: A small, often round, quick bread-like pastry, traditionally from Britain and Ireland

Cookie.Allergens: wheat (gluten), milk, eggs, nuts (such as peanuts and tree nuts), and soy
Cookie.Details: A baked snack or dessert that is typically small, flat, and sweet.

Victoria Sponge Cakes.Allergens: eggs, gluten (from wheat flour), and milk (from butter and/or milk powder)
Victoria Sponge Cakes.Details: Soft, tender, and fluffy, this Victoria Sponge Cake is a simple but delicious cake that's a British classic for a reason

Lemon Loaf Cake.Allergens: gluten, eggs, and dairy (milk and butter)
Lemon Loaf Cake.Details: This lemon loaf cake is soft, velvety, super moist and is bursting with lemon flavour

Surloin Steak.Details: Hassiba was talking about a surloin steak after not realising they weren't muted lol

Espresso.Allergens: gluten, milk, soy, nuts, and eggs
Espresso.Details: A concentrated coffee beverage made by forcing hot water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans

Latte.Allergens: The main allergen concern is milk
Latte.Details: A milk-based coffee drink typically made with espresso, steamed milk, and a thin layer of frothed milk on top

Cappuccino.Allergens: milk the primary allergen for most people
Cappuccino.Details: A popular coffee drink, typically made with espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam, all in equal parts

Macchiato.Allergens: include allergens such as caramel sauce and vanilla syrup which can contain milk and/or soy
Macchiato.Details: A coffee beverage that typically consists of a shot of espresso 'marked' or 'stained' with a small amount of steamed or foamed milk

Mocha.Details: A coffee beverage that combines the flavors of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate
